TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void DrawPageHandler(object o, DrawPageArgs args);
.class public auto ansi sealed DrawPageHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate

remarks.para: Event data is passed via the parameter.

To attach a to an event, add the DrawPageHandler instance to the event. The methods referenced by the DrawPageHandler instance are invoked whenever the event is raised, until the DrawPageHandler is removed from the event.
